trans-unit.source: Provides a glyph for an <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> to display when a user disables an activity at design time.
trans-unit.target: Fornece um glifo para um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> a ser exibido quando um usuário desabilita uma atividade em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: Activity designers display <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CommentGlyph> when a user sets the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Enabled%2A> property to `false` at design time for the designer or its parent designer.
trans-unit.target: Designers de atividade exibem <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CommentGlyph> quando um usuário configura o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Enabled%2A> propriedade `false` em tempo de design para o designer ou designer de seu pai.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CommentGlyph" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CommentGlyph" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> with which the comment glyph is associated.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> ao qual o glifo de comentário está associado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate whether the glyph appears on the activity designer surface; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para indicar se o glifo aparece na superfície do designer de atividade; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns the bounds for the current comment glyph on the specified <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Retorna os limites do glifo de comentário atual no <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that represents the bounds for the glyph.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> que representa os limites do glifo.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CommentGlyph.GetBounds%2A> inflates the bounds of `designer` by the value held in <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.Margin%2A> and returns the resultant rectangle.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CommentGlyph.GetBounds%2A> inflação dos limites do `designer` pelo valor mantido em <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.Margin%2A> e retorna o retângulo resultante.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> to perform fill and drawing tasks.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> para executar tarefas de preenchimento e de desenho.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate that the glyph appears on the design surface; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para indicar que o glifo aparece na superfície de design; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme" /> to use to access ambient property settings.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme" /> a ser usado para acessar configurações de propriedade de ambiente.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> from which to obtain information about user actions.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> do qual obter informações sobre ações do usuário.

trans-unit.source: Performs any tasks required to render the comment glyph on the activity designer surface.
trans-unit.target: Executa quaisquer tarefas necessárias para renderizar o glifo de comentário na superfície do designer de atividade.

trans-unit.source: Gets the view priority of the glyph on the activity designer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a prioridade de exibição do glifo no designer de atividade.

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the view priority of the glyph on the activity designer.
trans-unit.target: Um inteiro que representa a prioridade de exibição do glifo no designer de atividade.

trans-unit.source: Priority helps determine the order in which the glyph is displayed on the activity designer.
trans-unit.target: Prioridade ajuda a determinar a ordem na qual o glifo é exibido no designer de atividade.
